select DATE_FORMAT(x.VALID_DATE,'%Y-%m') validDate, sum(SC_COUNT) scCount, sum(EC_COUNT) ecCount from (SELECT t1.VALID_DATE, count(0) SC_COUNT, 0 EC_COUNT FROM T_CATERING_STAFF_CERTIFICATE t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from T_CATERING_STAFF where STAFF_STATUS =1) t2 ON t1.STAFF_ID = t2.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t3 ON t2.ENTERPRISE_ID=t3.ENTERPRISE_ID where t1.CERTIFICATE_STATUS=1 and t3.ENTERPRISE_STATUS=3 and t1.VALID_DATE <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -1 month) and t3.AREA_ID = #{areaId} group by t1.VALID_DATE union all select t1.VALID_DATE, 0 SC_COUNT, count(0) EC_COUNT from T_ENTERPRISE_CERTIFICATE t1 LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t2 on t1.ENTERPRISE_ID=t2.ENTERPRISE_ID where t1.CERTIFICATE_TYPE=3 and t1.CERTIFICATE_STATUS=1 and t2.ENTERPRISE_STATUS=3 and t1.VALID_DATE <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -1 month) and t2.AREA_ID = #{areaId} group by t1.VALID_DATE) as x group by DATE_FORMAT(x.VALID_DATE,'%Y-%m')

select DATE_FORMAT(x.VALID_DATE,'%Y-%m') validDate, sum(SC_COUNT) scCount from (SELECT t1.VALID_DATE, count(0) SC_COUNT FROM T_CATERING_STAFF_CERTIFICATE t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from T_CATERING_STAFF where STAFF_STATUS =1) t2 ON t1.STAFF_ID = t2.STAFF_ID LEFT JOIN T_ENTERPRISE_BASE t3 ON t2.ENTERPRISE_ID=t3.ENTERPRISE_ID where t1.CERTIFICATE_STATUS=1 and t3.ENTERPRISE_STATUS=3 and t1.VALID_DATE <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -1 month) and t3.ENTERPRISE_ID = #{enterpriseId} group by t1.VALID_DATE) as x group by DATE_FORMAT(x.VALID_DATE,'%Y-%m')
